Title: Die Hard 3: Villains with a Vengeance
Actors: Jeremy Irons, Samuel L. Jackson, John McTiernan, Sam Phillips
Plot: The "Villains Profile" focused on Jeremy Irons' Simon, but it also branched into coverage of Sam Phillips' Katya as the movie's baddies. We see the normal mix of movie clips, shots from the set, and interviews snippets.
